pages.text: This is important $(playername), pay attention. $(turtlemancy)Turtles$() blessings or cursed are the most important item to perform a ritual. Just remember this: don't dare you to kill a $(turtle). Turtles are special and, as a $(turtlemancer), your job is to take care of them, not to hurt them. $(br2)However, if you dare to cross that line... you will probably have struggles trying to get their forgiveness.

If you have never treated a $(turtle) the wrong way, when you bow and look to a $(turtle) (just like when you become a turtlemancer) the $(turtle) may $(turtlemancy)bless$() you. If that happens you will get the $(turtlemancy)blessing.$()

If you have ever treated a $(turtle) the wrong way, when you bow and look to a $(turtle) (just like when you become a turtlemancer) the $(turtle) may $(#d63031)curse$() you. If that happens you will get the $(#d63031)curse$().
